title: Plate, 1870–90
markings: In well of plate, written in gold above central decoration: "6" over "2605"
dimensions: H x diam.: 2.5 x 23.5 cm (1 x 9 1/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Charles E. Sampson Memorial Fund
description: Circular plate, the white body showing progressive sections of decoration around the scalloped rim: a tan ground with applied interlaced curving blue bands, and gilt floral border; the well with a section of gilt, stylized floral decoration in the center; the gilt numbers "6" over "2605" written above the decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, 1870–90.
1870–90. Glazed porcelain, gilding. Museum purchase from Charles E. Sampson Memorial Fund. 2003-5-2.
